original_title: Leslie Sansone: Walk Slim 3 Fast Miles
overview: Leslie Sansone: 3 Fast Miles  Losing weight has never been easier than with Leslie Sansone's "Walk at Home" programs. Now you will be able to lose weight even faster with the all-new breakthrough "Walk Slim" system. Featuring motivating hit music - Walk Slim is guaranteed to have you looking slimmer and feeling great in just 10 walks! This disc includes everything you need to get started on an easy-to-follow fitness routine that requires no complicated equipment and can be done in the privacy of your own home - rain or shine. Great music such as "We Are Family" and "I Feel Good" will keep you motivated throughout the workout. "3 Fast Miles" takes your fitness walk to the next level. While still simple to follow, this workout increases the speed of your walk to burn fat fast. All it takes is ten walks to see a slimmer and trimmer you. So take this home and start walking today.
title: Leslie Sansone: Walk Slim 3 Fast Miles
